titleStmt.title: A song in the last new comedy call'd The marriage hater matched set by Mr. Tho. Tollet and sung by Mrs. Butler.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
Tollett, Thomas, d. 1696?

notesStmt.note: First line reads: Bonny lad prithee lay thy pipe down.
Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
